orchestrator._description: Meta-agent ReAct loop limits. Controls how many reasoning cycles the orchestrator can perform when coordinating worker agents.

workflow._description: Session-wide workflow constraints. Hard timeout for entire workflow execution and maximum total agent calls per workflow.

agent._description: Worker agent ReAct loop defaults. Can be overridden per-agent in agent_registry.json. Controls how many times orchestrator can re-invoke the same agent.

llm._description: LLM API interaction limits. Controls timeouts, retry behavior, and token budgets for cost control. Applies to both OpenAI and Anthropic.

governance._description: Cross-cutting session-wide governance limits for compliance and cost control. Prevents runaway tool usage and excessive LLM API calls.

safety._description: Error recovery and circuit breaker mechanisms. Terminates agents stuck in loops or producing invalid outputs.

schema._description: Schema validation settings. Controls strictness, logging, and failure thresholds for agent output validation.
